body.name: Airplane Travel Essentials for Flying Flex Flap Cell Phone Holder & Flexible Tablet Stand for Desk, Bed, Treadmill, Home & in-Flight Airplane Travel Accessories - Travel Must Haves Cool Gadgets
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 12 hrs 5 mins
features: Created by a flight attendant who saw a need for a phone stand that would allow you to watch movies and TV shows on long flights with your personal device. The Flex Flap can be used by anyone with it's simple and flexible design. This phone holder makes for a great gift for birthdays and holidays

PREMIUM MATERIALS - Made of black leather materials for great phone grip and aluminum alloy core for adjust-ability. This extremely light weight travel accessory is smooth to the touch and durable to ensure your portable device will not be scratched or harmed.

FREE YOUR HANDS - This ultimate phone holder will make your travel or viewing experience more comfortable by placing your Android Tablet or iPhone at any angle you desire. A great cell phone holder for car to use your GPS or behind the headrest as a tablet stand for games and movies for kids. Flex Flap can be used as an iPad stand for easier recipe viewing while cooking in the kitchen.

UNIVERSIAL DESIGN - The Flex Flap's flexible and adjustable design makes it compatible to any device (iPhone, iPad air, Android phone, Android tablet, any mobile phone) with any case. Keep your purse close by hanging it on any chair or table at dinner, making it a fabulous travel accessories for women. Use it to hold up cook books in the kitchen or sheet music while playing an instrument. This cell phone holder has unlimited ways it can be used in your everyday life.

TRAVEL READY - Flex Flap will become one of your essential airplane travel accessories. It's sleek and compact design can be easily returned to it's original flat form to fit into any bag, purse or suitcase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for planes
reviews.reviewText: The Airplane Travel Essentials for Flying Flex Flap Cell Phone Holder & Flexible Tablet Stand for Desk, Bed, Treadmill, Home & in-Flight Airplane Travel Accessories - Travel Must Haves Gadgets is a great all-around phone and tablet stand. It is lightweight and flexible, making it easy to carry with you on airplanes, trains, or cars. It can also be used at home or in the office.The stand has a few different positions, so you can use it at a variety of angles. It can hold your phone or tablet horizontally or vertically, and you can even adjust the height to find the perfect viewing angle. The stand is also very sturdy, so you don't have to worry about your device falling over.One of the things I like best about the Airplane Travel Essentials for Flying Flex Flap Cell Phone Holder & Flexible Tablet Stand is that it is so versatile. It can be used for a variety of purposes, such as watching videos, reading books, playing games, or even making video calls. It is also very easy to use. Simply bend the arms of the stand into the desired position and place your device in the holder.Another thing I like about this stand is that it is very affordable. It is a great value for the price, and it is a great option for anyone who is looking for a versatile and easy-to-use phone and tablet stand.Overall, I am very happy with the Airplane Travel Essentials for Flying Flex Flap Cell Phone Holder & Flexible Tablet Stand for Desk, Bed, Treadmill, Home & in-Flight Airplane Travel Accessories - Travel Must Haves Gadgets (Pro Pink). It is a well-made and versatile stand that is a great value for the price. I would definitely recommend it to anyone.Here is a summary of the pros and cons of this stand:**Pros:*** Lightweight and flexible* Versatile* Easy to use* Affordable* Sturdy**Cons:*** None that I can think ofIf you are looking for a versatile and easy-to-use phone and tablet stand, I highly recommend the Airplane Travel Essentials for Flying Flex Flap Cell Phone Holder & Flexible Tablet Stand for Desk, Bed, Treadmill, Home & in-Flight Airplane Travel Accessories - Travel Must Haves Gadgets. It is a great value for the price, and I am sure that you will be happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Efficient to travel with!
reviews.reviewText: I have a similar product, and it’s cute, but inefficient for travel. This is awesome. Folds out flat and packs anywhere. Seems quite sturdy. One of those inventions that is so simple and brilliant simultaneously. Definitely useful and easilye worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and does the job
reviews.reviewText: Bought it for flights. From what I read, it seems that all other ideas doesn't suit with all airlines, and things tend to fall and break.With this product, nothing breaks nor fall. It's a simple idea that works well. Bought the XL for my 11.5'' tablet, since I'm not sure the small one is enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flexible, durable and FLAT to carry
reviews.reviewText: I've had one for over a year. It is light and flat, slips into carry-on easily. The material is flexible and durable, will support on the tray table OR hanging from the seat in front of me. Most versatile. Excellent.Just yesterday on a flight, there were 3 of us in the same row using this holder, kinda fun. We all used it differently and all very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A really useful little item!
reviews.reviewText: What a great invention! I struggle to with other phone holders, because I use a phone case that has a wallet in the back, and it never fits in a regular holder. But you shape this one yourself, so you can make it accommodate whatever you need. And it's very sturdy and flexible; best of all, you can flatten it when you're done so it slips easily into a bag. Great little product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and space saving
reviews.reviewText: This is so convenient and works perfectly, but doesn't take up space. It will be easy to take wherever you go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Expect Natural Creases
reviews.reviewText: First thing to note is that there will be creases and fold indentations when using these. Tough to fully straighten out. Even if you try, cannot get it back to its original flat form (not for perfectionists). Afraid overtime something will snap inside and render a section uselessThis product is basically a bendable metal (?) wrapped/stitched in leatherYou can fold it into any shape you wantHanging off tables and other appliances is mixed. It can work, but not all the time without support. Must be creative with the balancing or use other objects to help hold it in placeFor example, hanging off the table. The stock photo with a backpack is impossible unless the backpack is empty or you have a paper weight on it. Stock photo with the headrest, your headrest weight must have pressure on it. For car vents, must fold a tiny curve to hang on the backside which is not that easy to do, plus the weight hanging off it may damage your vents overtimeIt is flat and good for travel, but you must know the limitation and ways around it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We’ve all thought about wanting a product like this
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical when ordering thinking it sounded too good to be true. This invention is legit! Sturdy while malleable, easily packable, I hope that it stands up over time but even if not, at this price point I would just buy it again. Brilliant!
Great product. Sturdy and perfect for a stocking stuffer!
Bought this for the wife and she is 100% satisfied. Then, so am I.
En opinión de la persona que lo recibió como regalo, es fantástico, totalmente recomendado, moldeable y resistente, soporta bien los dispositivos.

Buscaba un soporte para el celular durante los viajes, definitivamente quería algo ligero y practico, este producto es Justo eso!!! Me encanto, es funcional y de calidad; excelente idea integrar un folleto que explica las opciones para uso y que además Marcus detalla por qué diseño este producto y muy cálidamente agradece la compra, genial!
